mapper.sql: CASE WHEN IFNULL(s.is_985, 0) = 1 THEN 1 WHEN IFNULL(s.is_211, 0) = 1 THEN 2 WHEN IFNULL(s.is_syl, 0) = 1 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END

where.if: AND MATCH(a.school_name, a.major_name, a.major_code) AGAINST(#{reqVO.keyword} IN BOOLEAN MODE)

choose.when: AND IFNULL(s.is_985, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(s.is_211, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(s.is_syl, 0) = 0

if.test: reqVO.publishTime != null and reqVO.publishTime.length == 2 and reqVO.publishTime[0] != null and reqVO.publishTime[1] != null

mapper.select:
SELECT a.school_id AS schoolId, a.college_id AS collegeId, a.major_id AS majorId, MAX(a.school_name) AS schoolName, MAX(s.school_logo) AS schoolLogo, MAX(a.college_name) AS collegeName, MAX(a.major_code) AS majorCode, MAX(a.major_name) AS majorName, MAX(a.degree_type) AS degreeType, a.year, a.study_mode AS studyMode, MAX(IFNULL(a.adjust_count, 0)) AS adjustCount, MAX(a.publish_time) AS updateTime, MAX(COALESCE(a.view_count, 0)) AS viewCount, MAX(COALESCE(a.hot_score, 0)) AS hotScore, MAX(s.province_name) AS provinceName FROM biz_adjustment a LEFT JOIN biz_school s ON s.id = a.school_id
GROUP BY a.school_id, a.college_id, a.major_id, a.year, a.study_mode ORDER BY hotScore DESC, updateTime DESC

SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT a.school_id AS schoolId, a.college_id AS collegeId, a.major_id AS majorId, MAX(a.school_name) AS schoolName, MAX(s.school_logo) AS schoolLogo, MAX(a.college_name) AS collegeName, MAX(a.major_code) AS majorCode, MAX(a.major_name) AS majorName, MAX(a.degree_type) AS degreeType, a.year, a.study_mode AS studyMode, MAX(IFNULL(a.adjust_count, 0)) AS adjustCount, MAX(a.publish_time) AS updateTime, MAX(COALESCE(a.view_count, 0)) AS viewCount, MAX(COALESCE(a.hot_score, 0)) AS hotScore, MAX(s.province_name) AS provinceName FROM biz_adjustment a LEFT JOIN biz_school s ON s.id = a.school_id
GROUP BY a.school_id, a.college_id, a.major_id, a.year, a.study_mode ORDER BY hotScore DESC, updateTime DESC LIMIT 100 ) t ORDER BY t.hotScore DESC, t.updateTime DESC

SELECT a.school_id AS schoolId, MAX(a.school_name) AS schoolName, MAX(s.school_logo) AS schoolLogo, MAX(s.school_type) AS schoolType, MAX(s.province_name) AS provinceName, a.year, MAX(IFNULL(a.adjust_count, 0)) AS adjustCount, MAX(a.publish_time) AS updateTime, MAX(s.is_985) AS is985, MAX(s.is_211) AS is211, MAX(s.is_syl) AS isSyl FROM biz_adjustment a LEFT JOIN biz_school s ON s.id = a.school_id
GROUP BY a.school_id, a.year ORDER BY updateTime DESC

SELECT r.school_id AS schoolId, r.college_id AS collegeId, r.major_id AS majorId, r.year, r.recruit_number AS recruitNumber FROM biz_recruit r JOIN ( SELECT school_id, college_id, major_id, year, MAX(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(publish_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '-', LPAD(id, 20, '0'))) AS pick_key FROM biz_recruit WHERE (school_id, college_id, major_id, year) IN
(#{k.schoolId}, #{k.collegeId}, #{k.majorId}, #{k.year})
GROUP BY school_id, college_id, major_id, year ) pick ON pick.school_id = r.school_id AND pick.college_id = r.college_id AND pick.major_id = r.major_id AND pick.year = r.year AND pick.pick_key = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(r.publish_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '-', LPAD(r.id, 20, '0'))

SELECT r.school_id AS schoolId, r.college_id AS collegeId, r.major_id AS majorId, r.year, r.recruit_number AS recruitNumber FROM biz_recruit r JOIN ( SELECT school_id, college_id, major_id, year, MIN(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(publish_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '-', LPAD(id, 20, '0'))) AS pick_key FROM biz_recruit WHERE (school_id, college_id, major_id, year) IN
(#{k.schoolId}, #{k.collegeId}, #{k.majorId}, #{k.year})
GROUP BY school_id, college_id, major_id, year ) pick ON pick.school_id = r.school_id AND pick.college_id = r.college_id AND pick.major_id = r.major_id AND pick.year = r.year AND pick.pick_key = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(r.publish_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '-', LPAD(r.id, 20, '0'))

SELECT DISTINCT hx.school_id AS schoolId, hx.college_id AS collegeId, hx.major_id AS majorId FROM biz_adjustment hx WHERE hx.year < #{currentYear} AND hx.adjust_count > 0 AND (hx.school_id, hx.college_id, hx.major_id) IN
(#{k.schoolId}, #{k.collegeId}, #{k.majorId})
SELECT DISTINCT a.college_id AS collegeId, a.college_name AS collegeName FROM biz_adjustment a WHERE a.school_id = #{schoolId} AND a.major_id = #{majorId} ORDER BY a.college_name ASC

SELECT DISTINCT a.study_mode FROM biz_adjustment a WHERE a.school_id = #{schoolId} AND a.college_id = #{collegeId} AND a.major_id = #{majorId} ORDER BY CASE a.study_mode WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 9 END, a.study_mode ASC

SELECT #{year} AS year, MAX(a.create_time) AS lastUpdateTime, SUM(CASE WHEN a.create_time >= CURDATE() AND a.create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayUpdateCount, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a.create_time >= CURDATE() AND a.create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN a.school_id ELSE NULL END) AS todayUpdateSchoolCount, COUNT(*) AS totalCount, COUNT(DISTINCT a.school_id) AS totalSchoolCount FROM biz_adjustment a WHERE a.year = #{year}
